title: Settings
subtitle: Configure your workspace, permissions, and integrations

language.title: Language
language.description: Set the default language for your organization
language.defaultLanguageHint: New users will inherit this language preference

items.rolesDesc: Define user roles, access levels, and field visibility rules
items.teamsDesc: Create teams and assign members for collaborative workflows
items.customFieldsDesc: Add and manage custom data fields across all entities
items.pipelinesDesc: Design deal pipeline stages and win/loss workflows
items.duplicateDetectionDesc: Configure matching rules, thresholds, and merge strategies
items.webhooksDesc: Manage event subscriptions for external integrations
items.importDataDesc: Import contacts, companies, or deals from CSV files
items.importHistoryDesc: Review past import jobs, results, and error logs
items.emailAccountsDesc: Connect email accounts for sending and tracking messages
items.notificationsDesc: Customize which events trigger alerts and how they are delivered

roles.title: Roles
roles.subtitle: Manage permissions and access control for your team
roles.noRolesDescription: Create your first role to define permissions and control access across your organization.

cloneDialog.title: Clone Role
cloneDialog.message: Create a new role based on "{{roleName}}".

roleEdit.createSubtitle: Define a new role with permissions
roleEdit.roleNameMaxLength: Role name must be 100 characters or less.
roleEdit.descriptionPlaceholder: What can users with this role do?

permissionMatrix.hint: Set access levels for each entity type. Scopes:

teams.title: Teams
teams.subtitle: Organize your people into collaborative groups
teams.noTeamsDescription: Create your first team to start organizing your people into collaborative groups.

teamEdit.teamNameMaxLength: Team name must be 100 characters or less.
teamEdit.defaultRoleHint: New members will inherit this role's permissions
teamEdit.addMembersHint: Add team members to start collaborating

customFields.title: Custom Fields
customFields.subtitle: Define and manage custom data fields for your CRM entities
customFields.noSections: No sections defined. Fields will appear under "General".
customFields.noFieldsDescription: Add custom fields to extend {{entity}} records with additional data.
customFields.label: Label
customFields.name: Name

pipelines.title: Pipelines
pipelines.subtitle: Configure deal flow stages and progression
pipelines.noPipelinesDescription: Create your first pipeline to start managing deal flow stages.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.subtitle: Manage event subscriptions and delivery logs
webhooks.noWebhooksDescription: Create a webhook to send real-time event data to external services.

testDialog.title: Test Webhook
testDialog.description: Send a test payload to verify your webhook endpoint is working.

emailAccounts.title: Email Accounts
emailAccounts.subtitle: Connect and manage your email accounts
emailAccounts.noAccountsDescription: Connect an email account to send and track messages directly from GlobCRM.

notifications.title: Notification Preferences
notifications.subtitle: Configure how and when you receive notifications

categories.assignmentsDesc: When you're assigned to a contact, deal, or task
categories.updatesDesc: When records you follow are modified
categories.mentionsDesc: When someone mentions you in a note or comment
categories.dealsDesc: When deals change stages or are won/lost
categories.importsDesc: When data imports complete or fail

duplicateRules.title: Duplicate Detection Rules
duplicateRules.subtitle: Configure how duplicates are detected and handled
duplicateRules.noRulesDescription: Create rules to automatically detect potential duplicate records.
